amendment.description: Amendment extends the public housing drug elimination program for two years.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 36 in the Congressional Record of May 7, 1996, to extend authorization for a reconstituted drug elimination grant/anti-crime program through Fiscal Year 2001.

action.text: Vento amendment (A021) modified by unanimous consent. Modification to extend authorization for a reconstituted drug elimination grant/anti-crime program only through Fiscal Year 1998.
On agreeing to the Vento amendment (A021) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
